PROJECTS.raw:
to 2016).
preparing civil drawings, hvac system, ventilation system shop drawings, details of plans, elevations, section details, schedules, ceiling layouts and as-built drawings.
preparing co-ordination drawings for all mep services. preparing of duct layout from single line diagram conceptual sketches & engineering. preparing schedules for the fan coil a/c units, air handling units, package a/c units, chillers, exhaust fans
specifying the material for ducts and their size according to smacna standard. calculating duct size by using of mcquay ductsizer. calculating air terminals as per ashrae standards. modification and co-ordination of all workings required. attending the meetings with concerned engineers to evaluate the overall progress. guiding workmen in hvac fields. preparing hvac boqs, reports and calculating ducting in linear meter, square meter & kilograms.
